periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 3 mph.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 16, with temperatures rising to around 21 overnight. North northeast wind 2 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 21, with temperatures falling to around 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill values as low as -1. North wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 7. Wind chill values as low as -7. North northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Snow before 3pm, then snow and a slight chance of sleet. Cloudy, with a high near 15. Northeast wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Snow and a slight chance of sleet. Cloudy, with a low around 12. North northeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 3 to 7 inches possible.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Snow. Cloudy, with a high near 17. North wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 8pm, then a slight chance of snow showers between 8pm and midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 3. Northwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 16. West wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 3. South southwest wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 29. South southwest wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 15. Southwest wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 29. West northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
